nodes.name: AI Check Email

parameters.text:
=Classify the email with decimal values (0 to 1) for isUnwantedConfidence, isMarketingConfidence, and isSpamConfidence, where 0 means clearly wanted (e.g., billing, invoices, orders, job applications, security) and 1 means clearly unwanted (e.g., promotions, setup reminders, irrelevant alerts); treat system-generated alerts or device activity (like sound played, device found, location pinged) as unwanted unless they are security-related; use 0.5 as the baseline for deletion and provide a concise briefReason explaining the classification.

{{ JSON.stringify($json) }}

nodes.notes: This agent node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: If Unwanted Marketing or Spam
nodes.notes: This if node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Telegram Sent Email Deleted Notification

parameters.text: =Email Deleted | {{ $('If Unwanted Marketing or Spam').item.json.output.emailFrom }} | {{ $('If Unwanted Marketing or Spam').item.json.output.briefReason }}

nodes.notes: This telegram node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Telegram Sent Email Not Deleted Notification

parameters.text: =Skipping Email | {{ $('If Unwanted Marketing or Spam').item.json.output.emailFrom }} | {{ $('If Unwanted Marketing or Spam').item.json.output.briefReason }}

nodes.notes: This telegram node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Telegram Sent AI Error Notification

parameters.text: =AI Error | Can't Check Email | Error: {{ JSON.stringify($json) }}

nodes.notes: This telegram node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.notes: This telegram node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Increment Loop Var

assignments.name: page
assignments.value: ={{ ($('Forward Prev Page Num').isExecuted) ? $('Forward Prev Page Num').first().json.prevPage + 1 : $('Initialize Loop Vars').first().json.page }}

parameters.content:

- Includes error handling
- Follows best practices

3. Test workflow
4. Deploy to production

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation 2

parameters.content:
# Gmail Workflow

## Overview
Automated workflow: Gmail Workflow. This workflow processes data and performs automated tasks.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 23
- **Node Types**: 12
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **Gmail Get Email**: gmail
- **When clicking ‘Test workflow’**: manualTrigger
- **Google Gemini Chat Model**: lmChatGoogleGemini
- **GmailDeleteEmail**: gmail
- **AI Check Email**: agent
- **Unwanted Email Output Parser**: outputParserStructured
- **If Unwanted Marketing or Spam**: if
- **Telegram Sent Email Deleted Notification**: telegram
- **Telegram Sent Email Not Deleted Notification**: telegram
- **Telegram Sent AI Error Notification**: telegram
- ... and 13 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.
